title: GameLinesConfig
description: Config file for lines that will be injected into the game upon creation. Note that all lines in game need to be no more than 19 characters.

GanonIntro.description: Gets the phrases for first dropping down into Ganon's room.

TriforceRoom.description: Gets the phrases for the won game screen in Zelda

HintLocationIsMandatory.description: Hints for stating that a location is mandatory for completing the game

HintLocationHasUsefulItem.description: Hints for stating that a location has an item that is useful, but not mandatory for completing the game

HintDungeonMedallion.description: Hints for stating that a dungeon needs a medallion

HintLocationHasSword.description: Hints for stating that a location has a sword

HintLocationEmpty.description: Hints for stating that a location has no useful items

HintLocationHasItem.description: Hints for stating that a location has a specific item

KingZora.description: Line for King Zora saying what he has

BottleMerchant.description: Line for the bottle merchant saying what he has

ChoiceYes.description: Options for replying with yes to a dialog choice

ChoiceNo.description: Options for replying with no to a dialog choice

GanonSilversHint.description: Options for Ganon giving a hint to the silvers location

GanonNoSilvers.description: options for Ganon saying that silvers aren't found for the player in a plando

SahasrahlaReveal.description: Options for Sahasrahla's green pendant dungeon reveal text

BombShopReveal.description: Options for the bomb shop red crystal dungeon reveal text

TavernMan.description: Options for the guy in the Kak bar that has a bunch of jokes in vanilla

Possibility.description: Represents one possibility of a SchrodingersString.

Weight.description: Gets the weight associated with the item.

AdditionalLines.description: Additional lines to be stated after the initial line. Used for adding additional poses.
